document_data.caption: A map showing Umbergoth on the fringes of the Umbers Marshes.
document_data.name: Umbergoth
document_data.mainbody: '''Umbergoth''' was the tallest mountain in [[Aglarond]]. As of {{yearlink|1368}}, it had never been scaled.

Geography.Flora & Fauna: There had been sightings of [[griffon]]s and [[hippogriff]]s around the peak. By {{yearlink|1372}}, [[Nartheling]] had scared off most of them, alongside the [[giant eagle]]s, out of the mountain peak. There were asperii on the mountain, in fact.

document_data.Rumors & Legends: [[Asperii]] were a rumor in {{yearlink|1368}}.{{cite book/Dragons of Faer√ªn|27-28}}
document_data.Notable Locations: The dragon Nartheling had made his lair in a labyrinthine complex of caves inside the peak, surrounded by the nests of griffins and asperii. As of {{yearlink|1374}}, he had discovered a network of hidden ''[[portal]]s'' in the tunnels.
document_data.Inhabitants:
[[Galeb duhr]] were known to inhabit the mountain.{{cite book/Spellbound/Campaign Guide|48}} The mountain's fauna included [[wyvern]]s, and in fact, [[beholder]]s lived in hidden tunnels.

Nartheling inhabited the mountain from {{yearlink|1360}} to at least {{yearlink|1374}}.
